price: “gabroota Rabbii gara kiyya kennaa! Ani isiniif ergamaa amanamaadhaa,” jechuun (isaanitti dhufe).
arabic: أَنۡ أَدُّوٓاْ إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: an addū ilayya ʿibāda al-lahi innī lakum rasūlun amīnun
